message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested in the product but I can only do $13,000 right now. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit away from my desired price.  I'm willing to go down to $13,500. This is a fair price for both of us and ensures I can make a reasonable profit.  Let me know your thoughts.
